description:
Commander of the U.N. Spacy`s 12th Fleet, he commands the fleet flagship http://anidb.net/ch49159 [Gloria] and leads a valiant but ultimately futile defense against the Marduk invasion near the Moon. The http://anidb.net/ch49159 [Gloria] is destroyed when the sheer number of Marduk warships overwhelms the defenders.
Source: wiki
name: Balser
